about_the_game:
Prepare for intense Free-to-Play multiplayer 5v5 FPS action. Inferno Arena is a 3-freedoms-of-movement multiplayer First Person Arena Shooter in ultra-low-latency 1,000 ticks-per-second glory. Fight as a MAV (Maneuvering Armored Vehicle) in the tunnels of the Mendeleev Space Force Base on the far side of the moon to control humanity's first FTL starship. Defend your HQ and destroy your opponent's while battling the enemy squadron among waves of automated defenses.
  • Experience an eclectic mix of popular game mechanics. Weapon and movement dynamics are from popular FPS games while gameplay objectives are modeled after MOBA games.
  • Customize your ship with a variety of familiar weapon styles and specialized equipment.
  • Build customized strategies with your friends in a 5-player squadron.
  • Climb the ranks of the competitive ladder for bragging rights.
  • Watch high level matches in a full featured observer replay mode.
  • Experience the lowest latency game ever, ready to enable elite gamers, with 1,000 tick-per-second gameplay and multi-thousand frame-per-second graphics.
